name: Blitzkrieg (itch)
description:
Blitzkrieg is the top-down shooting game. Players can choose four different countries' tanks and fight to take their victory. Go out there and get Glory with your vehicle!

Game Features

-local multiplayer 

-two player PvP

-four different tanks

-weapon pickups

-different maps

Every feed backs and advice are welcome!

Contact email: lfgk1996@gmail.com
